snippet: The public health panic spreading around Ebola has now infected both political parties, which have launched a finger-pointing policy debate just weeks before the midterm elections.
abstract: The public health panic spreading around Ebola has now infected both political parties, which have launched a finger-pointing policy debate just weeks before the midterm elections.

headline.main: If Cuts Could Kill: Democrats Fight Back on Ebola

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
